Revelations 2 Solve

This cipher was took 3,451 days to solve!

This cipher went unsolved from September 6, 2016 until February 17, 2026, spanning 3,451 days.

Congratulations to randomiser71 for solving this cipher! This is the longest time taken to solve a cipher in the history of the series (beating GK 12 by just 9 days), and it is a testament to the difficulty of this cipher.

Length: 5907 characters

Solution

Section titled “Solution”
  • Credit to randomiser71 for solving this cipher!

Important notes

Section titled “Important notes”
The algorithms described in this solution are using a deprecated PHP library called "mcrypt". This library uses CFB8 instead of nCFB (as pretty much all modern tools use). Because of this distinction, you cannot actually solve these ciphers using modern libraries or tools like CyberChef. You need to find a library or tool that supports cfb8. There is one website in particular that does support it, which you can find here.

Steps

Section titled “Steps”

Step 1: Remove the ‘v’ from the ciphertext.

Step 2: Decode the hexadecimal. This will result in a base64 sequence.

Step 3: DES decrypt with CFB settings and key “ZOMBIES”. This will produce a Bacon cipher:

Length: 2102 characters

Step 4: Decode the Bacon cipher to get the plaintext. This ciphertext was also truncated by Treyarch, so we do not know the ending but it is likely “MONTY” as lore-wise, Monty was the one responsible for chalk outlines and machines around the maps.

Plaintext

Section titled “Plaintext”

SAMANTHA FINALLY LEFT THE HOUSE TODAY SHE WAS THE LAST ONE I UNDERSTAND HOW HARD IT WAS FOR HER BUT SHE KNOWS THIS WORLD IS BIG AND BEAUTIFUL AND NEEDS TO BE EXPLORED I AM SURE SHE WILL SEE THE OTHERS ALONG HER TRAVELS HONESTLY I WILL MISS HER THE MOST I MUST ADMIT IT LOOKS LIKE I AM NOT NEEDED ANYMORE RETIREMENT HERE I COME IT S TIME TO PACK UP ALL THE CHALK BOXES AND MACHINES AND GO BEHIND THE SCENES GO TO THAT GODDAMN WHITE SAND BEACH I HAVE THOUGHT ABOUT FOR AGES AND CHILL I MEAN NOTHING CAN GO WRONG NOW SIGNING OFF ???
